ASSIGNMENT.szTooltipText: Perform life-saving surgery on your wounded men, using state-of-the-art equipment. Increases the DOCTOR's efficiency.
Plenty of opportunities to upgrade your medical skills here. The locals may also appreciate the side effect of you being on-call in the hospital.
Plenty of supplies, reference books, and equipment needed to teach someone how to apply a band-aid properly.

Plenty of supplies, reference books, and equipment needed to learn how to apply a band-aid properly. Also plenty of patients to practice on - bandaging the locals, properly, is good for the cause after all.
Of course you will get better in a hospital.
Yay, hospital food! Keep the team fed and healthy.
Have a drink at the local bar! Increases loyalty in this town, for a price and a chance to get drunk.
Arrange some takeout from the local bar.
Have a drink at the... Yeah, you wish! Just buy drinks to others and immediately report any info they may spill.
Help maintain law and order in this country by lending a hand in the prison. Not exactly what you signed up to do though.
Your mercs can Interrogate prisoners of war here. Prisoners might join you cause, or give you helpful information.
Masquerade as one of prisoners and gain their trust to easily gather information and prevent mutiny attempts.
Cafeteria meals, but at least they're warm and freshly cooked. Sure beats eating MREs day in, day out.
A bit of hands on management with shipping the Crepaton products out of Danubia by sea will increase your profits. Be a good boss and the locals may appreciate the new management.
A bit of hands on management with shipping the Crepaton products out of Danubia by air will increase your profits. Be a good boss and the locals may appreciate the new management.
Airplane food will keep you going, not much more. Somewhere in this airport is a supply of duty free little bottles of booze.
Have a drink at the... Yeah, you wish! Just buy drinks to others and immediately report any info they may spill.
Spend some time loading and unloading aircraft. Increases the efficiency of STRENGTH practice.
Keep the lights on, and the people will appreciate you more.
Spend some time in the gym. Increases the efficiency of STRENGTH practice.
Cafeteria meals, but at least they're warm and freshly cooked. Sure beats eating MREs day in, day out.

The war room here has all sorts of digital equipment, designed for maintaining a good grasp on the strategic situation across the country. This will help you coordinate your defenses, and collect information about enemy movements in the wilderness.
Well stocked libary on leadership theory.
Well stocked libary on leadership theory.
Take control of local information channels and control the flow of news in entire region.
This military installation has a war room that allows you to move your militia in the strategic screen. You can order them to move via the 'W', 'A', 'S' or 'D' keys.
Why not spend some time practicing your aim? The dummy targets are practically begging for it. It sure as hell beats taking pot-shots at rocks out in the wilderness.
Why not spend some time practicing your aim? The dummy targets are practically begging for it. It sure as hell beats taking pot-shots at rocks out in the wilderness.
The locals here may be willing to scout out the surrounding area for you. You can collect the information gleaned from them to get a better idea about enemy activity in this region.
Turn this small local office into well-oiled propaganda machine, suppressing any bad news reaching town and showing our actions in the best possible light.
Goose will owe you for keeping the skys clear for him.
Help out the plant manager and increase profits.
War is stressful, you'll find a way to unwind here.
A solemn hour of prayer and devotion in a quiet little church can help raise anyone's spirit. It might also convince the locals that you respect their way of life.

There's plenty of gymnastic equipment here, just waiting to be used. This is a great way to get a balanced work-out that might improve your shape considerably. Increases the efficiency of HEALTH training.

There's plenty of gymnastic equipment here, just waiting to be used. This is a great way to get a balanced work-out that might improve your shape considerably. Increases the efficiency of STRENGTH training.
Like Napoleon, take the opportunity to add to the archaeological knowledge of this country.

The war room here has all sorts of digital equipment, designed for maintaining a good grasp on the strategic situation across the country. This will help you coordinate your defenses, and collect information about enemy movements in the wilderness.
Turn this small local office into well-oiled propaganda machine, suppressing any bad news reaching town and showing our actions in the best possible light.
This place is practically littered with spare parts for anything you might imagine. This will certainly make any repair-work considerably easier.
This place is practically littered with spare parts for anything you might imagine. This will certainly make any repair-work considerably easier.
This place is practically littered with spare parts for anything you might imagine. This will certainly make any repair-work considerably easier.
Sun, summer, sunshine. This sure as hell beats sleeping in a trench.
Look a mini-bar. This sure as hell beats sleeping in a trench.
This motel is slightly more hygenic than the battlefield.
The DNP may know a thing or two about riot control and urban fighting. Why not study their service manuals to learn how it should be done?
This sure as hell beats sleeping in a trench.
The sickbay is slightly more hygenic than the battlefield.
Cafeteria meals, but at least they're warm and freshly cooked. Sure beats eating MREs day in, day out.
All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.
All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.
All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.
All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.

All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.
All UBT stations seem to have at least one or two food vendors.
Your mercs can Interrogate prisoners of war here. Prisoners might join you cause, or give you helpful information.
Your mercs can Interrogate prisoners of war here. Prisoners might join you cause, or give you helpful information.
The machinery here can manufacture all sorts of replacements parts, which will increase your efficiency at repair, assuming you know how to use the complex machinery here.
Improve your explosives skill by working on the assembly line for a bit.
Spend some time loading and unloading cargo. Increases the efficiency of STRENGTH practice.
A bit of hands on management with shipping the Crepaton products out of Danubia will increase your profits. Be a good boss and the locals may appreciate the new management.
Improve your explosives skill by working on the assembly line for a bit.
